name: Kemonomichi-White Moment-
description: Adventure novel　game. (English subtitles) Story synopsis： Large sword in hand, a man plans his escape from the organization. Running from his pursuers, he is forced to wander. Then, before his eyes… a girl appears. In the silver-haired girl’s hand, a long sword that seems otherworldly.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000, Geforce 9500GT, Radeon HD 3650 or above DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible
